cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading

Class OffloadingManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.OffloadingManager

  • public class OffloadingManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Management class for offloading capabilities. This is central authority for deploying offloadable backend components, storing their state data and connecting Application level with DEECo level. Uses Restlet library to serve offloadable backends

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2015 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz

      DEECo manager for communicating with DEECo layer - spawning DEECo components, defining new ensembles or controlling runtime (start/stop)

      Runtime mode without frontend capabilities.

      Runtime mode with deployed Frontend and BackendStateData components.

    • Field Detail

      • MODE_WITH_FRONTEND

        public static final int MODE_WITH_FRONTEND
        Runtime mode with deployed Frontend and BackendStateData components. Generally used for applications with user interface - client.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MODE_ONLY_BACKEND

        public static final int MODE_ONLY_BACKEND
        Runtime mode without frontend capabilities. Generaly used when deploying backend only.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getInstance

        public static OffloadingManager getInstance()
        App-wide provider for OffloadingManager singleton instance. Before using this, the singleton instance must be created using createInstance(cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.udpbroadcast.UDPBroadcast, String)
        Returns:
        Singleton instance

        Parameters:
        udpBroadcast - UDPBroadcast implementation (platform-specific)
        appId - Unique application ID
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        backendInterface - Backend interface

      • init

        public void init(int runtimeMode)
        Initializes DEECo according to runtimeMode and registered backends. Spawns DEECo components and registers needed ensembles
        Parameters:
        runtimeMode - Runtime Mode (either MODE_ONLY_BACKEND or MODE_WITH_FRONTEND)

      • start

           throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts DEECo runtime and Backend serving
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

          throws java.lang.Exception
        Stops DEECo runtime and Backend serving
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • spawnNewMonitor

        public void spawnNewMonitor(BackendMonitorComponent backendMonitorComponent)
        Used to spawn new BackendMonitor at DEECo level. This is usually called from DEECo runtime (DeviceComponent spawning new Backend monitors)
        Parameters:
        backendMonitorComponent - Backend Monitor component instance

      • getBackendProxy

        public <T> T getBackendProxy(java.lang.Class<T> backendInterface,
                    java.lang.String host)
        Returns Restlet proxy for remote/local backend which can be used as normal Java class to retrieve/send any data from/to any backend.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        backendInterface - Interface of requested backend (backend of this type must have been attached before via attachBackend(cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.backend.OffloadableBackendImpl, Class))
        host - IP address of the remote/local host
        Returns:
        Backend proxy according to specified interface

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:
